name: TimeAndDateTest
description: Unit tests for TimeAndDate class, focusing on various date and time operations.

test_cases.name: testFutureDate
test_cases.description: Tests the future date generation to ensure it is in the future.

test_cases.name: testFutureDateWithBounds
test_cases.description: Tests the future date generation with bounds to ensure it falls within the specified range.

test_cases.name: testFutureDateWithMinimum
test_cases.description: Tests the future date generation with minimum bounds to ensure it falls within the specified range.

test_cases.name: testPastDateWithMinimum
test_cases.description: Tests the past date generation with minimum bounds to ensure it falls within the specified range.

test_cases.name: testPastDateWithReferenceDate
test_cases.description: Tests the past date generation with a reference date to ensure it falls within the specified range.

test_cases.name: testPastDate
test_cases.description: Tests the past date generation to ensure it is in the past.

test_cases.name: testPastDateWithBounds
test_cases.description: Tests the past date generation with bounds to ensure it falls within the specified range.

test_cases.name: testBetween
test_cases.description: Tests the date generation between two specified instants to ensure it falls within the specified range.

test_cases.name: testBetweenWithMaskReturningString
test_cases.description: Tests the date generation between two specified instants with a mask to ensure it returns a formatted string.

test_cases.name: testBetweenThenLargerThanNow
test_cases.description: Tests the date generation between two specified instants where the upper bound is before the lower bound, expecting an exception.

test_cases.name: testBirthday
test_cases.description: Tests the birthday generation to ensure it falls within the default age range.

test_cases.name: testBirthdayWithAges
test_cases.description: Tests the birthday generation with specified age ranges to ensure it falls within the specified range.

test_cases.name: birthdayWithMask
test_cases.description: Tests the birthday generation with a mask to ensure it returns a formatted string.

test_cases.name: futureWithMask
test_cases.description: Tests the future date generation with a mask to ensure it returns a formatted string.

test_cases.name: pastWithMask
test_cases.description: Tests the past date generation with a mask to ensure it returns a formatted string.

test_cases.name: periodTest
test_cases.description: Tests the period generation to ensure it falls within the specified range.

test_cases.name: durationTest
test_cases.description: Tests the duration generation to ensure it falls within the specified range.

test_cases.name: maxLessThanMinPeriod
test_cases.description: Tests the period generation with max period less than min period, expecting an exception.
